messages.subject: So glad to have found you....
messages.msgSnippet: Well, I joined this group a few days ago, and have been so inspired by the posts already. I knew that I was going to homeschool my 2 younger children, (now 2
messages.messageBody:
Well, I joined this group a few days ago, and have been so inspired by
the posts already.
I knew that I was going to homeschool my 2 younger children, (now 2 and
almost 4) because of the difficult time my teens (18 and 17) had in
elementary, public, private, and catholic schools. No matter where I
sent them, I was dissapointed, as were they.
So, I started looking into homeschooling last year (when everyone was
telling me I needed to get my daughter into a pre-pre-school) and came
across unschooling. It just makes so much sense! Although I know it
will be hard for me, to always wrap my head around the concept.

But I wanted to say thanks for all the info I have gleaned from you
guys so far! Now I know where to go when I am stuck.

Have a great day!
